summary: When pirates threaten your existence, how far would you go to fight for what you believe? For those you care about? Monarchs...
caption:
When pirates threaten your existence, how far would you go to fight for what you believe? For those you care about? Monarchs take harsh measures to contain the advance of piracy. But the measure backfires. Now, royal families watch the gruesome consequences of the actions, drowning nations in panic. Who could be the next heir to disappear?

               An appless royals/pirates pairs smut rp (a little bit of everything)

home. ~ navi. ~ characters. ~ pairs. ~ taken fcs. ~ app.

title: Episode 1: Against My Best Advice
body:
Episode 1: Against My Best Advice

It’s our first episode discussing Marvel comics’ Carol Danvers! Things we discussed: Walter Lawson is a dick! Chris educates us on what Florida looks like! Rachael spoils comics from the 1980s! Carol’s outfits! Love triangles that are all very one-sided! The history of the title Captain Marvel! Butts of popular heroes! Mar-Vell casually steals someone’s identity and it’s never mentioned again! Get on board to read Marvel Super Heroes #13 and Captain Marvel #1-9 with us.

summary: David F. Sandberg racconta una storia circa la confusione sul nome Captain Marvel
title: David F. Sandberg racconta una storia circa la confusione sul nome Captain Marvel
body:
David F. Sandberg racconta una storia circa la confusione sul nome Captain Marvel

Il regista di Shazam!, David F. Sandberg, ha recentemente parlato di un esilarante incontro con un fan che ha confuso Captain Marvel con la controparte con lo stesso nome dell’Universo Cinematografico Marvel interpretata da Brie Larson nel film omonimo.

Nel corso della storia dei fumetti, ci sono stati casi in cui personaggi si somigliavano, o magari hanno avuto nomi simili, ma la particolarità…

View On WordPress

title: The podcast is live!
body:
Hi, everyone! The first episode of Ask Me About Captain Marvel is live and the second one is coming this week! The link to subscribe is here:

https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/ask-me-about-captain-marvel/id1437301646

Join us as we discuss the sexist and dated origins of Carol Danvers. It’s a fun but sometimes perplexing time!

Watch this space for pictures and show notes!

blog.name: electronicdelusionstarlight
blog.title: Burdened with Cursed Knoweledge
blog.description:
Thomas. 23. Italian. Male. Feminist. Literal Pile of Salt. Asexual. Aromantic. Bisexual. Massive Nerd.
English isn't my first language. Ravenclaw. Evil Overlord. I tend to be Sappy about my OTPs and Salty about my NOTPs.

summary: Do not, by any circumstances, read Avengers Vol 1 #200.
body:
I’ve just seen a post mentioning some Marvel Comics featuring Captain Marvel/Carol Denvers in case people wanted to read about her before the movie comes out, and I’m gona do a PSA now so I can warn Ya’ll before it’s too late:

Whatever it happens…

Do not, by any circumstances, read Avengers Vol 1 #200.

Carol is in it and is a centre character, but I assure you, in this day and age? It will ruin your enjoyment of comics due to the godawful context and implications.

Because avenger vol 1 #200? In layman terms?

Is the story about Carol giving birth to her magical mind controlling r*p*st before marrying him and being forced to elope with and to go hell dimension with him, and the Avengers find nothing wrong with that.

And it was done as an attempt to write Carol out of comics, much like the killing joke was supposed to write Barbara out of comics.

So, rule of thumb: If you stumble upon it when searching for Carol Denvers comics to read, or some asshole suggests you to read it because you have shown interest in the character, Do yourself a favor, and do not read it.

This has been a PSA,

blog.name: marvelzombiespromos
blog.title: Marvel Zombies Promos
blog.description:
This is the promo page for Marvel Zombies RP. For more information, please visit our main page.

The characters advertised are not an exclusive list, rather they are a short list of suggestions. Our intention is to maintain a rotor of characters from a variety of backgrounds. Please feel free to apply outside of the characters posted here.

summary: The world has fallen to a monstrous infection, those who remain must band together to survive.  In Upstate New York, heroes and...
caption:
The world has fallen to a monstrous infection, those who remain must band together to survive.  In Upstate New York, heroes and civilians alike are working to build a life, even in the wake of civilisation crumbling.

Marvel Zombies RP open character: Carol Danvers

Moderator suggestion for this character:

Carol flew to Earth when the Alpha Flight Aerolith was initiating lockdown procedures, determined to assist the Avengers rather than hide in the safety of space.

Survivors connected to Carol:

  • Raven Darkholme • Mystique
  • Jessica Drew • Spider-Woman
  • Wanda Maximoff • The Scarlet Witch
  • Natasha Romanoff • Black Widow
  • Anna Marie • Rogue

Home || Plot || Rules || Taken/Open Characters || FAQ || Most Wanted

summary: ¿Será esta el arma verdugo de Thanos en Avengers 4?
title: ¿Será esta el arma verdugo de Thanos en Avengers 4?
body:
¿Será esta el arma verdugo de Thanos en Avengers 4?

Marvel Asia, dio a conocer esta imagen:

Si le rascamos un poquito, podremos recordar la historia de Fear Itsel, donde a Captain Marvel y otros héroes obtuvieron las armas artesanales de Asgard. Es posible que el origen del hacha cambie en la nueva cinta de los Vengadores.

Otro personaje voceado es Doctor Strange y el Hacha de Angarruumus, así que sería posible volverlo a ver con vida tras el…

summary: theories on how Captain Marvel will not age Avengers 4?
body:
theories on how Captain Marvel will not age Avengers 4?

Was she a teen during the events of her film?

does she and some enemies get frozen and she can only be unfrozen by the pager, but it’s for emergencies only?

I mean the latter would explain why she is not in avengers.
